body_html:
@HWiese1980
I have been encountering reboot problems like yours. However, reboot happens sometimes as early as importing tensorflow (loading *.so), and sometimes after running a few iterations of training. In this case do you this it's a PSU problem like yours? Since I have tested out loading Theano and the same problem occurs on loading Theano.

body:
@HWiese1980 
I have been encountering reboot problems like yours. However, reboot happens sometimes as early as importing tensorflow (loading *.so), and sometimes after running a few iterations of training. In this case do you this it's a PSU problem like yours? Since I have tested out loading Theano and the same problem occurs on loading Theano.
